data.name: Word Search VR
data.description: A classic game makes its way to VR, bringing with it a level of challenge and immersion that only VR can provide. You are placed inside a sphere of letters and must find the words hidden within. Choose from categories with vibrant themes, each featuring several puzzles to keep you entertained. Go ahead, jump into a whole new universe of word games with Word Search VR.

changelog.change_log:
Staying home during the pandemic? Solve some Pandemic word searches!
Also added new puzzle for April

New categories
New Environment
Crash Analytics support
Oculus Go support with higher resolution and frame rate

* Rolls dice* You walk into a room. You are surrounded by letters. You need to find as many Dungeons and Dragons themed words as possible in order to defeat this quest. Just don't fail your spot check!

We're ready for the Holidays!
 Lots of new goodies in this build, with new categories, new backgrounds, easier easy and medium modes, direction hints, and lots more!
 Get searching!
Easy difficulty now has only 5 words to solve, and Medium difficulty has 7. Jump into Easy or Medium for a quick game, or play on Hard for the full challenge!

Fixes back button behavior (Thanks Jake for reporting!)
Sharper text on word list. 
Rearranged categories and puzzles. 
Thanks for a great first week of Word Search VR! Don't forget to rate the app :)
